refsect2.title: polkit_sysdeps_get_exe_for_pid ()
refsect2.para: Get the name of the binary a given process was started from. Note that this is not reliable information; it should not be part of any security decision. If the information could not be obtained 0 is returned and out_buf will be set to "(unknown)".

listitem.simpara: buffer to store the string representation in

Number of characters written (not including trailing '\0'). If the output was truncated due to the buffer being too small, buf_size will be returned. Thus, a return value of buf_size or more indicates that the output was truncated (see snprintf(3)) or an error occured. If the name cannot be found, -1 will be returned.
